briefdescription.para: Type of the raw finite element container.

memberdef.definition: using Ikarus::SparseFlatAssembler< FEC, DV >::Base = VectorFlatAssembler<FEC, DV>
memberdef.name: Base

memberdef.definition: using Ikarus::SparseFlatAssembler< FEC, DV >::GridView = typename Basis::GridView
memberdef.name: GridView

briefdescription.para: Type of the grid view.

memberdef.definition: using Ikarus::FlatAssemblerBase< FEC, DV >::Basis = typename DV::Basis
memberdef.name: Basis

briefdescription.para: Type of the basis.
Type of the Dirichlet values.
Type of the finite element container.
Type of the finite element requirement.

memberdef.definition: using Ikarus::FlatAssemblerBase< FEC, DV >::GlobalIndex = typename FEContainerRaw::value_type::GlobalIndex
memberdef.name: GlobalIndex

briefdescription.para: Type of the global index.

memberdef.type: std::conditional_t< std::is_reference_v< FEContainer >, const FEContainer, FEContainer >
memberdef.definition: using Ikarus::FlatAssemblerBase< FEC, DV >::FEContainerType = std::conditional_t<std::is_reference_v<FEContainer>, const FEContainer, FEContainer>
memberdef.name: FEContainerType

briefdescription.para: Type of the finite element container (reference or by value).
Raw sparse matrix without changes for dirichlet degrees of freedom.
Sparse matrix.
Reduced sparse matrix.
Vector storing indices of matrix entries in linear storage.
Vector storing indices of matrix entries in linear storage.
flags that store if the sparsity pattern construction happened
Constructor for SparseFlatAssembler.

memberdef.definition: const Eigen::SparseMatrix< double > & Ikarus::SparseFlatAssembler< FEC, DV >::getRawMatrix
memberdef.name: getRawMatrix

briefdescription.para: Calculates the matrix quantity requested by feRequirements and returns a reference.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the finite element requirements.

simplesect.para: Const reference to the raw sparse matrix quantity.

memberdef.definition: const Eigen::SparseMatrix< double > & Ikarus::SparseFlatAssembler< FEC, DV >::getMatrix
memberdef.name: getMatrix

briefdescription.para: Calculates the matrix quantity requested by feRequirements and returns a reference. A zero is written on fixed degrees of freedom rows and columns, and a one is written on the diagonal.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the finite element requirements.

simplesect.para: Const reference to the modified sparse matrix quantity.

memberdef.definition: const Eigen::SparseMatrix< double > & Ikarus::SparseFlatAssembler< FEC, DV >::getReducedMatrix
memberdef.name: getReducedMatrix

briefdescription.para: Calculates the matrix quantity requested by feRequirements and returns a reference. The size of the matrix has the size of the free degrees of freedom.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the finite element requirements.

simplesect.para: Const reference to the reduced sparse matrix quantity.

briefdescription.para: Calculates the vectorial quantity requested by feRequirements and returns a reference.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the finite element requirements.

simplesect.para: Const reference to the calculated vectorial quantity.

briefdescription.para: Calculates the vectorial quantity requested by feRequirements and returns a reference. A zero is written on fixed degrees of freedom.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the finite element requirements.

simplesect.para: Const reference to the calculated vectorial quantity.

briefdescription.para: Calculates the vectorial quantity requested by feRequirements and returns a reference. This vector has a reduced size by the number of fixed degrees of freedom.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the finite element requirements.

simplesect.para: Const reference to the calculated reduced vectorial quantity.

briefdescription.para: Calculates the scalar quantity requested by feRequirements and returns a reference.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the finite element requirements.

simplesect.para: Const reference to the calculated scalar quantity.

briefdescription.para: Returns the size of the free degrees of freedom, which are not fixed by a Dirichlet boundary condition.

simplesect.para: Size of the reduced degrees of freedom.

briefdescription.para: Returns the size of nodes, i.e., the number of degrees of freedom.

simplesect.para: Size of the degrees of freedom.

briefdescription.para: Creates the full-sized vector of size Dof and inserts the values of a reduced vector at the "free" degrees of freedom and writes a zero for the fixed doffs.
Returns the container of finite elements.

simplesect.para: Reference to the finite element container.

briefdescription.para: Returns the number of constraints below a given degrees of freedom index.

parameterdescription.para: Index of the degree of freedom.

simplesect.para: Number of constraints below the given index.

briefdescription.para: Returns true if a given degree of freedom is fixed by a Dirichlet boundary condition.

parameterdescription.para: Index of the degree of freedom.

simplesect.para: True if the degree of freedom is fixed; false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Coarse estimate of node connectivity, i.e., this relates to the bandwidth of a sparse matrix. This estimate overestimates the real connectivity and should only be used for allocating vectors.

simplesect.para: Size_t Coarse estimate of node connectivity.

detaileddescription.para: Calculates the non-zero entries in the full sparse matrix and passes them to the underlying Eigen sparse matrix.
Calculates the non-zero entries in the sparse matrix and passes them to the underlying Eigen sparse matrix. The size of the matrix has the size of the free degrees of freedom.
Saves the degree of freedom indices of each element in the vector elementLinearIndices.
Saves the degree of freedom indices of each element in the vector elementLinearIndices but excludes fixed degrees of freedom.
Pre-processes the raw sparse matrix before assembly.
Pre-processes the reduced sparse matrix before assembly.

briefdescription.para: SparseFlatAssembler assembles matrix quantities using a flat basis Indexing strategy. The matrix is stored in a sparse matrix format. This format is exploited during the assembly process.

parameterdescription.para: Type of the finite element container.
